      • normalDistribution

        public static double normalDistribution(double mu,
                                        double sigma,
                                        double x)
        Computes the normal distribution.
        Parameters:
        mu - the mean value μ
        sigma - the standard deviation σ (variance σ2)
        x - the value for which the normal distribution should be computed
        Returns:
        normal distribution value at x

      • normalDistribution2D

        public static double normalDistribution2D(double muX,
                                          double muY,
                                          double sigmaX,
                                          double sigmaY,
                                          double rho,
                                          double x,
                                          double y)
        Computes the normal distribution for two dimensions.
        Parameters:
        muX - the mean value μx for the x-axis
        muY - the mean value μy for the y-axis
        sigmaX - the standard deviation σx for the x-axis (variance σx2)
        sigmaY - the standard deviation σy for the Y-axis (variance σy2)
        rho - the correlation co-efficient ρ
        x - the x-value for which the normal distribution should be computed
        y - the y-value for which the normal distribution should be computed
        Returns:
        normal distribution value at x, y

      • normalDistribution2D

        public static double normalDistribution2D(double muX,
                                          double muY,
                                          double sigma,
                                          double x,
                                          double y)
        Computes the normal distribution for two dimensions (one sigma for both axes, no correlation).
        Parameters:
        muX - the mean value μx for the x-axis
        muY - the mean value μy for the y-axis
        sigma - the standard deviation for both axis
        x - the x-value for which the normal distribution should be computed
        y - the y-value for which the normal distribution should be computed
        Returns:
        normal distribution value at x, y

      • normalDistributedRandom

        public static double normalDistributedRandom(double mu,
                                             double sigma)
        Generates the normal distributed random number.
        Parameters:
        mu - the mean value μ
        sigma - the standard deviation σ (variance σ2)
        Returns:
        a normal distributed random number

      • normalDistributedRandom2D

        public static double[] normalDistributedRandom2D(double muX,
                                                 double muY,
                                                 double sigmaX,
                                                 double sigmaY)
        Generates the normal distributed random number for two dimensions.
        Parameters:
        muX - the mean value μx for the x-axis
        muY - the mean value μy for the y-axis
        sigmaX - the standard deviation σx for the x-axis (variance σx2)
        sigmaY - the standard deviation σy for the Y-axis (variance σy2)
        Returns:
        a normal distributed random number (array of two, [0]: x-value, [1]: y-value)

      • normalDistributedRandom3D

        public static double[] normalDistributedRandom3D(double muX,
                                                 double muY,
                                                 double muZ,
                                                 double sigmaX,
                                                 double sigmaY,
                                                 double sigmaZ)
        Generates the normal distributed random number for three dimensions.
        Parameters:
        muX - the mean value μx for the x-axis
        muY - the mean value μy for the y-axis
        muZ - the mean value μz for the z-axis
        sigmaX - the standard deviation σx for the x-axis (variance σx2)
        sigmaY - the standard deviation σy for the y-axis (variance σy2)
        sigmaZ - the standard deviation σz for the z-axis (variance σz2)
        Returns:
        a normal distributed random number (array of three, [0]: x-value, [1]: y-value, [2]: z-value)
